mapper.select: SELECT RECIPE.RECIPE_NO, RECIPE.MEMBER_ID, RECIPE.RECIPE_TITLE, RECIPE.VIEW_COUNT, MEMBER.MEMBER_NICKNAME FROM RECIPE LEFT JOIN MEMBER ON RECIPE.MEMBER_ID = MEMBER.MEMBER_ID ORDER BY RECIPE_NO

SELECT RECIPE.RECIPE_NO, RECIPE.MEMBER_ID, RECIPE.RECIPE_TITLE, RECIPE.VIEW_COUNT, MEMBER.MEMBER_NICKNAME FROM RECIPE LEFT JOIN MEMBER ON RECIPE.MEMBER_ID = MEMBER.MEMBER_ID WHERE RECIPE.RECIPE_NO = #{recipeNo}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RECIPE WHERE RECIPE_TITLE LIKE '%' #{searchKeyword}

SELECT * FROM RECIPE
RECIPE_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
ORDER BY RECIPE_NO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RECIPE (RECIPE_NO, RECIPE_TITLE, RECIPE_CONTENT_NO, MEMBER_ID, RECIPE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, DEL_YN, VIEW_COUNT, RECIPE_SOURCES_NO) VALUES (SEQ_RECIPE_NO.NEXTVAL, #{recipeTitle}, #{recipeContentNo}, #{memberId}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, 'N', 0, #{recipeSourcesNo})
